title: How does the ban system work?
body:
For quite a few games now i've been matched with some really toxic players, at the end of the game they always say to report me, in any case, after each game that this happens the client notifies me that I've been 'reported' by these players.

Can anyone tell me how the ban system works because i don't want to be banned for absolutely no reason.

replies.body:
Luckily, there is a safeguard against these sorts of things. Being reported by a player who has been reported themselves does not count as much as a player reporting you who has a clean record.

In addition to that, you can only be perma-banned after a red reviews your case. Any ban you get from reports would only be sort ones, so hopefully you can just wait it out.

If you get banned, you can't wait it out and you believe that it's for no reason, then immediately send a ticket to support explaining the situation.
